review.summary: Code is generally well-structured, but has some areas for improvement.

issues.title: Missing error handling for API request
issues.description: The code does not handle potential errors that may occur during the API request, such as network errors or invalid responses.
issues.suggestion: Add try-except block to handle potential errors

issues.title: Unused variable 'response'
issues.description: The 'response' variable is not used after it is assigned, and can be removed to improve code readability.

issues.title: Magic string '/users/{user_id}'
issues.description: The URL path '/users/{user_id}' is a magic string and should be replaced with a constant or a variable to improve code maintainability.
issues.suggestion: Replace magic string with a constant or variable

suggestions: Consider adding input validation for user_id
Use a more robust way to parse JSON data

main_issues: Potential missing error handling for HTTP response
